customer_reviews.title: Destroyed a good bottle of Cab
customer_reviews.text: Whatever they used to impregnate the rubber part you place the bottle on, is what my bottle of expensive cab tasted like and there's no way to clean the taste off that part. It is quite disgusting unless you like the taste of dried rubber in your wine.
customer_reviews.author: Fred R.

customer_reviews.title: Stopper did not fit in caraffe
customer_reviews.text: Stopper was too large to fit into the caraffe. I have used this exact brand of decanter before so I know they are snug, but this one one was not going in and I was afraid to push down on it too hard. The glass caraffe was also exceptionally dusty when I took it out of the box, which is a little unusual and made me question whether this was new and/or authentic. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Spencer

customer_reviews.title: ... from Amazon last Christmas and my husband and I love it. I works great at aerating your wine ...
customer_reviews.text: Our son bought us this carafe from Amazon last Christmas and my husband and I love it. I works great at aerating your wine and the parts fit snuggly onto the carafe. However, sadly, the glass of this carafe is literally paper thin, and I'm not exaggerating. Last week it broke with just the slightest of tapping against a fork, yes a fork! I'm debating about replacing it with this exact carafe again, because I'm sure the manufacturer (which surprised me as being from CHINA), has not changed the design of this paper thin carafe. For $50.00, if should hold up a lot longer than 6 months!
customer_reviews.author: LLF

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful decanter
customer_reviews.text: i have bought three of these and I love them! The first one I accidentally broke, the second was unfortunately lost to the ex, and now I have my own third one. The first time I saw this decanter was at a tasting room in Malibu. I thought it was so cool that they were able to decant a bottle for me and return the wine back to the original bottle for me to take to our dinner that we would be having next door! It essentially decanted it twice and we were able to still show the bottle of wine for our guests to read the label. You cannot go wrong with this decanter!
customer_reviews.author: Bri-mel

customer_reviews.title: Nice and effective product.
customer_reviews.text: Been very pleased with both the look and results. Easy to use in both directions so serving from the bottle or the decanter is easy. If you're having a big party and plan to use it, I'd suggest getting started BEFORE your guests arrive since it does take some time to go back and forth and then stay a little ahead of demand. I didn't purchase a drying stand but it would be a good idea. Actually, I think a simple platform could/should be part of the purchase. I've used it for reds and some whites and cleaning has not been a problem. Guests love to see it in action!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan90265

customer_reviews.title: Flew off and broke, shattering glass everywhere
customer_reviews.text: On the first use, this decanter flew off the wine bottle and broke. I bought this as a father's day gift after my husband enjoyed this decanter at a wine dinner. My husband had rinsed the decanter with water instead of white wine. He decided to then demonstrate the diffuser to a guest with white wine. The bottle emptied, no problem. The decanter inverted and after refilling the bottle 3/4, the decanter flew off and crashed to the counter, shattering glass everywhere. I went back to the instructions to see if we had done something incorrectly. Nope. Very disappointed in this product, especially since I purposely bought this brand and ignored the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn E Koehn

customer_reviews.title: BEST DECANTER EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This could possibly be the BEST decanter in the world! We have 2 of these decanters in our home and we have purchased several for gifts! It's a great gift for any wine lover! The decanter allows you to decant the wine and then put it back in the bottle for presentation! This is such a genius idea! Love this item! Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Decantor
customer_reviews.text: What a neat invention. No more playing around with funnels trying to get the wine back in the bottle to take to dinner. Only have one concern. This type of decanting does not allow for the removal of any sediment from the wine. Still have to do it the old fashioned way if you have a wine with heavy sediment. Other than that it is a GREAT addition to any bar.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love your favorite wine, even more so.
customer_reviews.text: I do so enjoy my Hess Select Cabernet Sauvignon even more when I run it through this wine carafe. It truly aerates your favorite wine in one easy step. Flip it over to put back in bottle, then do it again if need be. Depending on the wine, I like to let it breathe for an hour or two, in the carafe. Try it this way a few hours before your steak dinner. I've enjoyed this so much, I did indeed purchase another to give to a friend. Give this a try, I hope you'll enjoy this wonderful wine carafe as well. Have a great day.
customer_reviews.author: MegaDave

customer_reviews.title: Smooth!  Fragile.......  Fun to do.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. Did a before and after test and it really smooths the wine. VERY fragile! Caution, the empty carafe can blow off the bottle after it empties so keep your hand on it until you remove it. Be careful removing it too because the pressure will surprise you and blow it out of your hand. I think this is the air expanding as it comes to room temp,after being cooled by the wine. I'm talking red wine at cellar temp.
customer_reviews.author: mbl

customer_reviews.title: Makes a significant difference with $18 bottles of red wine.
customer_reviews.text: I’m thrilled with this purchase! Decanting wine is sped up by the aeration feature, making a $18 bottle of wine taste significantly better. I was hesitant with the negative reviews...and have to admit that is is fragile. It did pay for itself after about 5 uses when you consider it made the wine taste like more expensive bottles. Just be careful washing and drying it.
customer_reviews.author: carlos f.

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself hours of decanting
customer_reviews.text: I was looking around for another decanter and after watching reviews on youtube, this one came up. The design is engineered for oxygenating your wine much faster than a regular decanter, and with much more oxygen than one of the common wine vents that you can buy. I have used a Vinturi red and white wine aerator since they were featured on Oprah years ago, but this decanter by Menu is beautiful and works 3-4 times better according to the paperwork that comes with the unit (as well, I can tell when a wine has been well opened up). Given that most wines on the market are young wines, this should be in everyone's liquor cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: Kory Mac

customer_reviews.title: Good aerator; great design!
customer_reviews.text: This design may be the BEST aerator on the market -- we like it because you can do straight from the bottle to the carafe then back into the bottle: always fun to watch and makes an immediate difference in the taste of the wine. Cleans easily, good construction. We liked ours so much we got a second one as a gift for some of our wine-loving friends.
customer_reviews.author: Bluesun

customer_reviews.title: Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I really like being able to decant and aerate my wine between the wine bottle and this decanter repeatedly to get better aeration. Carafe is also not too big and fit into the fridge easily. The plastic band at the bottle lip is drip-proof so that was a nice bonus. My original product arrived shattered because packaging was a problem. It was replaced by Amazon quickly so I did not take off any points.
customer_reviews.author: RPL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product

I wouldnt use the decanter itself to serve wines (though 3-4 bottles into the party it no longer matters). decanting works really well for young wines, easily equal to an hour sitting in any other decanter. another reviewer mentioned this is not the method to use for older (read vintage) bottles as all the sediments will get stirred up, and those are best decanted the old way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Idea, But Not a Quality Item

Considering I was being very careful, either it due to a design flaw or my particular unit had some flaw whereby the integrity of the glass was compromised. Either way, bottom line is the purchase was not worth it. Too bad, as I liked the design.

product_meta.title: Menu Winebreather Carafe
product_meta.description: Size:12h (in)This elegantly designed carafe aerates your wine in one easy step. Simply press the decanter onto the top of an opened bottle of wine and flip it over so that the wine pours into the decanter. You can serve the wine from the decanter, or flip it back over once it's done and pour the aerated wine back into the bottle and serve from the original bottle.
